instructions.1: In a bowl, mix the sour cream, butter, and flour. Divide into two equal portions, cover, and refrigerate 2 hours.
instructions.2: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
instructions.3: Roll out the dough portions on a flat surface. Place a gouda ball in the center of each portion, and wrap. Roll wrapped balls in the cumin. Place on a baking sheet.
instructions.4: Bake 20 minutes in the preheated oven, until lightly browned.

questions.question: In Step 4, is the oven from Step 2 being used?
Is oven from Step 2 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is flour from Step 1 still available in Step 2?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 1?
If we skip Step 2, is it still valid to use the oven in Step 4?
Can we mix (Step 1) and bake (Step 4) at the same time?
